item.title: Microbit
item.description: The BBC Micro Bit is an ARM-based embedded system designed by the BBC for use in computer education. The board is 4 cm × 5 cm and has an ARM Cortex-M0 processor, accelerometer and magnetometer sensors, Bluetooth and USB connectivity, a display consisting of 25 LEDs, two programmable buttons, and can be powered by either USB or an external battery pack. Wikipedia Hardware Size: 43 mm × 52 mm (half credit card)
